channel.title: Working Mom on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space
channel.description: Recent content in Working Mom on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space

item.title: How to think about your career path considering baby
item.description: This is quite a difficult post to write. I’ve been struggling with my career path for the past months, and I think it was related to my maternity leave and new motherhood status. Fortunately, as I’m making some changes to my career (I recently transitioned to a different role within the same company), I’m feeling a lot more refreshed and hope to share some lessons learned along the way.
